PROS:
+ Fun and engaging gameplay.
+ Brain teaser; makes ya' think.
+ Wide variety of very clever puzzles.
+ A blast in co-op mode.
+ An interesting story with a great sense of humor.
+ Modest hardware requirements.
+ Windows, Mac, and Linux compatible.

CONS:
- Only if you think First Person should always have "shooter" after it.
Um ótimo jogo pra jogar sozinho e com um amigo,além de ter q pensar bastante para passar de algumas fases.
Экспериментальный центр напоминает вам, что  вы  торт.

Excelente secuela que incluye más variedad de mecánicas que la primera entrega, con soluciones francamente ingeniosas. Por otra parte, las superficies donde podemos aplicar los portales son más limitadas que en la primera entrega, por lo que el margen de error es menor. Por tanto la dificultad está mayormente en las mencionadas nuevas mecánicas.

También hay más variedad de escenarios, pero no daré más detalles para no dar spoilers.

El juego es más largo que la primera entrega, aproximadamente el triple, y tiene más humor, sobre todo por la parte de GLaDOS.

Pros vs. Cons of Portal 2

Pros
-MLG turret killing with goo.
-Amoozing graphics.
-Gr8 storyline.
-Vary scaray drawings in rooms with radios.
-These puzzles will kill you.
-This game makes me have to think for once...
-JOHN CENA turret killing.
-LASER BEAM EXPLOSIONS
-Ending music is bootiful.
-DUAL PORTAL GUN to bad it isn't dual wield am I right?
-Aerial faith plates make me believe I can fly.
-Goo makes me feel like a superhero.
-The voice recordings.
-YOU CAN MAKE YOUR OWN PUZZLES FOR PEOPLE TO FAIL AT.
-There's a co-op campaign.
-Blue cubes.

Cons
-The cake is still a lie.
-That moment when a turret shoots you and there's nothing you can do about it.
-Can't throw up from eating repulsion gel.

Maybe i will want to replay last escape stages and ending later in singleplayer. I didnt done challenges or coop, so nothing i can say about it.

好游戏没的说！
   -完美的剧情  这是一款游戏中最值得重视的了（我认为），玩之前最好先玩玩一代，剧情更有条理
   -良心的画质  画质很棒，有电影的感觉，而且一般的家用机就可运行，无需太高配置
   -丰富的关卡  关卡内容明显比一代丰富，与剧情接轨，极大地丰富了玩家的体验（一代我玩了3小时，二代却玩了整整8小时,不算合作模式）(这水平是快是慢？）
   -无数的难题  我认为二代比一代稍难，但仍然十分有趣（我认为数学老师们应该让学生去玩Portal来作为家庭作业）
   -人物  尽管Portal只有几个角色，Wheatley和PotatOS（啥？）的加入让我感觉一点也不孤单（你是无法想想在一个死气沉沉空无一人的实验室中有个伴的感觉的！）
P.S. 此游戏极易导致眩晕呕吐等症状！！！


What a GREAT GAME!
   -Perfect Plot    This is the most important part of a game(I think),before you play it,I think it's better to play Portal1 first,it makes the polt more orgazined.
   -Conscientious Picture    The game has a wonderful feeling just like movie.A normal PC is good enough to play it.
   -Rich Levels    Portal2's levels is certainly richer than Portal1's.It took me 3 hours to play portal1,but I spent WHOL EIGHT HOURS on portal2!(No including cooperation model,of course)(Is that slow or fast?)
   -So Many Problems(Not the game)    You have so many problems to solve! In my opinion Portal2 is a little harder than Portal1,but it's still very interesting!(I really think maths theachers should ask students to play Portal 1 and 2 as their home work!)
   -Characters    Though Portal has only few characters,Wheatley and PotatOS(WHAT?)'s join makes me don't feel lonely any more.
P.S. This game causes VERTIGO and VOMIT easily!!!
Such a cool game, it's really worth buying!

Well I'm glad that I got off my ass and wrote this review.

This is a great game, I enjoyed every second of it, I played the Co-op once but with some stranger, I think it would have been more fun with friends but it was well put together. As for the community puzzles? Some good, some bad, great idea though.

The actual game was great. The first time I saw this series was at my cousin's place while he was playing it, it intrigued me, so I later bought Portal for my Xbox 360, I fell in love with it right away, great puzzles, easy to understand, well put together overall. When I finished that game I was excited for Portal 2, when I got it I played it right away and, as I said, enjoyed every last second of it. It's an amazing sequel to the original I loved so much. This game came out in 2011 and still stuns me visually, I enjoy the humor, and the characters, they felt so alive. I finished the game fairly quick and will probably play it again after I buy the original on Steam.

All-in-all, this is a great game, if for some reason you're looking at this before the first, buy the first.
Wow what an amazing game. It builds upon Portal 1 and adds new items and is a lot longer than the first game. Plus there are great player made maps which you can dl and play.

Portal 2 has to be one of the best games of all time. And not just because of the action, the co-op, the ability to make new and custom test chambers to keep the fun going, or all the comedy and depth from such a small cast of characters. It is because it is a game where to win, you have to use that thing inside your skull between your ears. 
What is it called?  
-Your bran?
-Your brian?
-BRAIN, that's it, you have to use your brain.

Una mejora sustancial sobre el primer juego. Tiene humor, momentos emocionantes y montones y montones de acertijos (puzzles) para superar.
El control de jurgo en primera persona está muy bien ajustado, se puede utilizar el mouse y teclado o control común.
Sin duda es de esos juegos que cualquier videojugador debe probar.
Portal 2 is a game with a great story, creative characters, and lots of puzzles. 10/10

Ik zelf ben al een fan van zulke dingen, vooral waar je je creativitiet kan loslaten.

This game doesn't really need to have its praises sung (the number of people who have already played and reviewed this game positively is already a pretty good indication that it's worth experiencing), but I felt compelled to put in my two cents. I'm going to keep it brief because I'm sure that I won't be saying anything new (and I don't think I would be able to really explain how I feel about this game even if I tried), but this game is truly wonderful and special! This game was the first one I bought on steam (it was, in fact, the reason I made an account) and I do not regret the purchase at all! 

This game is funny and clever and it is a well put together first-person puzzle game. I have played the game many times now, and even though there is no challenge in the single-player puzzles anymore, I still enjoy playing because I think it's an amazing game with all its witty dialogue, understandable mechanics, interesting story, good level design, and lovable characters! This game holds a special place in my heart, and I definitely recommend the purchase! I haven't played much of the co-op, but from my personal experience it would probably be better to play with someone you know who doesn't have all the answers already and is receptive to working together.
Fantastic game with great gameplay, story and graphics. Coop campaign is an added bonus.
youll will enjoy the commedy and story of the game

If you havent played this game ... You're seriously missing out. Its an amazing experience and it has soooooo much to offer.  Between the tricky puzzles, the amazing story , the new additions to your testing experience ( the gels), the first ever co -op levels in portal, and creating and playing your own tests, you will find yourself summerged in SCIENCE ! .. for several hours on end ... haha... just please , do yourself a favor and buy this game.

Well well well. Portal 2. For those of you who have already seen my Portal review, you know what I think about the Portal franchise. Portal is a great game, with some frustrating parts. Portal 2 follows that same level of difficulty, but change GREAT, to AMAZING. First of all, our villain(s) are great. The voice acting is great once again, as are the characters. True, it is just the cores, Glados, Wheatly, and Cave Johnson and Carolin, but all of them with the exception of Carolin which I'll get to later are all geat. The game follows the same rutine that you did last time. Except the game visually looks MUCH BETTER. You can see this in the ruins of the old testing chambers and the ending cut scene. Now do you remember in the last game where you run from Glados, only to reach Glados? Well, in this game you do the same thing, until you reach Glados, who reawakens at the beginning of the game. You see, you've been traveling with Wheatly this whole time. A lovable robot with a great voice and personality. You then get to Glados, and replace her from full control to Wheatly.  At the time, you think it's a great idea, until Wheatly does his laugh. He then promptly throws you and Glados out of the facility, giving you 18+ more stages to play! And while Glados scolds you for being stupid, you feel like it's your fault, and it is! But now the game is flipped. Wheatly and Glados have swapped, and she has become, A POTATO BATTERY. Well then. You then go through all these levels, where new mechanics are introduced. And durring these levels, you not only find out more about Apature curtesy of Cave Johnson's voice, you also find out that Glados is Carolin! You then finally make it back to Wheatly, and then have to endure a similar fight to the last game! BUT IN REVERSE. See with last time, you had to knock cores off of a defenseless Glados with rockets, slowly currupting herself, making her explode. Now here, you want to put cores onto Wheatly. Now you may actually want to listen to these cores for once, as they are hilarious. Namely Space Core. Now here, you do the same thing, but Wheatly defends himself! Anyway, the game "ends" with Wheatly being sent to the moon, Glados being back in control, and Chel being sent away out of Apature. Now with online mode, or Co-op, you go through hard levels. Now, your experience is best with friends or having a mic, because believe me, people do troll here. And lastly, the level creator. I'm a fan of this in concept, but my computer just doesn't agree with the controls. If you can get more out of this mode, well more power to you. Overall, I think that Portal 2 is an amazing game.
